title: @Riot - is something being done about Viktor & Azir?
body: I mean, seriously. They've been God-tier in LCS for this entire season, can something be done about their absolutely ludicrous burst damage, while having the range to be completely safe?

replies.body: They got nerfed ages ago, it has just not trickled down to wood 5 meta yet. Counterpick.

'Wood 5 Meta' - You should look up someones summoner profile before you start shitposting, especially when you're Silver 3.
Higher Plat players than myself, and even quite a lot of Diamond players agree that both Viktor and Azir are too strong of mid laners for the safety they get with their ranges.

Now I would definitely agree that Vik is incredibly strong and should probably get scaled down a bit, but Azir is how he's always been. His win rate is around 50% and I don't agree with the idea that he's too strong. He's annoying, but like a lot of other champions it's who matches up against him and the focus that determines how useful he'll be that game. IMO Vik nerf > Azir nerf
First of all it has not been the entire season. Also their damage is fair compared to their weaknesses. If you know how to play against them then it is easy to beat them.
